sentences.en: Horace and the Gorgons gossip on the horrible Halloween.
sentences.cn: 赫拉斯和蛇发女怪三姐妹在可怕的万圣节前夕聊八卦.
霍拉斯?德?克雷真诚地咯咯直笑.

sentences.en: Horace Greeley was first of all a successful newspaperman.
sentences.cn: 霍勒斯·格里利首先是一位颇有建树的办报人.

sentences.en: Horace handed over the checks, the owner throws aside.
sentences.cn: 霍勒斯递出支票, 店主丢在一边.

sentences.en: Horace hurried home to shout the good news to his family.
sentences.cn: 霍勒斯急忙跑回家想把这一好消息大声告诉给家里人.

sentences.en: Horace is so devoted to his garden that he hasn't been away for 10 years.
sentences.cn: 霍勒斯对他的花园太过上心，都有10年没出过远门了。

sentences.en: Horace stop eating: Oh, yes. What I do for you?
sentences.cn: 霍勒斯停止吃饭: 噢, 是的. 有什么事 吗 ?

sentences.en: It was now that he showed his friend, R. C. Dallas, a new satire, Hints from Horace.
sentences.cn: 就在这个时候,他把一首新的讽刺诗《霍勒斯的启示》给他的朋友R. C. 达拉斯看.

sentences.en: My mother insisted on naming me Horace.
sentences.cn: 我母亲坚持给我取名叫霍勒斯。

sentences.en: Ovid and Horace challenge comparison with the best elegiac and lyric poets of Greece.
sentences.cn: 奥维德和贺雷西要同希腊最好的挽歌和抒情诗人争一日之长.

sentences.en: Sir Willoughby had practised a studied courtness upon Vernon and Horace.
sentences.cn: 威洛比爵士向维农和霍拉斯很不自然地献殷勤.

sentences.en: Sir. Willoughby's countenance was enough for his friend Horace.
sentences.cn: 威洛比爵士的面部表情向他的朋友霍拉斯表达了他要说的一切.

sentences.en: Voice Over: the court, Horace and shopkeepers are quarrelling together.
sentences.cn: 旁白: 法庭上, 霍勒斯和店主争吵起来.

sentences.en: Wisdom is never dear , provided the article be genuine Horace Greeley.
sentences.cn: “文章只要真实,智慧并不难得.”(贺拉斯·格瑞利).

sentences.en: Your laughter, Horace, is a capital comment on your wit.
sentences.cn: 你的笑声, 霍拉斯, 是对你的笑话所做的最好注解.
